thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 29 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Entertainment One To Raise Up To 53 Mln Stg Via Placing -Bookrunner

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Entertainment One To Raise Up To 53 Mln Stg Via Placing -Bookrunner
text:
Jan 29 (Reuters) - Entertainment One Ltd:
* UP TO 53 MLN STG PRIMARY PLACING‍​ * PLACING REPRESENTS UP TO C.4.0 PCT OF MARKET CAP (BASED ON THE 26/01 CLOSING SHARE PRICE)‍​
* PRICE GUIDANCE TO BE DETERMINED BY BOOKBUILD‍​ * PLACING TO PARTIALLY FINANCE EQUITY INTERESTS ACQUIITION OF DELUXE PICTURES D/B/A THE MARK GORDON CO NOT ALREADY HELD BY CO
* J.P. MORGAN CAZENOVE, INVESTEC AND RBC ACTING AS JOINT BOOKRUNNERS FOR PLACING Further company coverage:
